dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land of Eridoria is plagued by darkness and destruction.

dialogues.speaker: Eira, the protagonist
dialogues.text: I've had enough of living in fear. I'm going to find out what's behind this darkness and put an end to it.

dialogues.speaker: Arin, Eira's friend
dialogues.text: Eira, are you sure that's a good idea? We don't know what we're up against.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: As Eira and Arin venture into the unknown, they stumble upon an ancient prophecy that speaks of a chosen one who will bring light back to the world.
